means: 展览，陈列
陈列品，展览品
显示器
炫耀
显示
陈列
展开，伸展
夸示，炫耀
（计算机屏幕上）显示

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"展览"或"展览会"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: exhibition, exhibit, show, exposition, fair, display
means: exhibition ： 一般指较正规的展览会。
exhibit ： 多指个人或团体陈列的展览品，规模可大可小。
show ： 指艺术品、农产品、工业品或商品等的任何形式的公开展览。
exposition ： 多指大型博览会或国际博览会。
fair ： 侧重指为促销商品而举办的展览会或商品交易会。
display ： 指展销会，商店橱窗或柜台上的陈列品。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"显示，显露，展现"之意。
means: show ： 最普通用词，泛指任何有意或无意地把东西给别人看的行为。
exhibit ： 指公开或正式地展示，以便引人注目或让人检查。
display ： 多指将某物陈列在显眼之处以便让发现其优点，侧重有意识地显示。
manifest ： 书面正式用词，指明确地表明。
demonstrate ： 指明显地表露感情。也指用实例、实验推理等手段表演证明，或论证某一问题。

word_mean: 个体以表情、动作、鸣叫和气味向同种其他个体发出信息，意在引起其他个体的行为改变。炫耀具有通信功能，包括行为炫耀、声音炫耀和气味炫耀等。

sentence.Network_en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentence.Network_en: It was an incredible display of motherly love and forgiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是慈母般关爱与宽容的了不起的表现。

sentence.Network_en: Normally, such an outward display of affection is reserved for his mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常，只有在母亲面前他的情感才会如此外露。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'unfurl, unfold'): from Old French despleier, from Latin displicare 'scatter, disperse' (in medieval Latin 'unfold'). Compare with deploy

encyclopedia.content: 函数名：display 功能：显示输出函数 用法：void display(); 程序例： #include<iostream.h> template <class k1, class k2> void display(k1 x, k2 y); void main() { char c='h',str[]="ok2002"; int n=100; float x=5.5; double z=1.23456; //两个参数类型相同 display(c, char(c+2)); //h j display(x,2*x); //5.5 11 display(n, 2*n); //100 200 display(str, str); //ok2002 ok2002 display(z, 2*z);

entry.def: If you display something that you want people to see, you put it in a particular place, so that people can see it easily.

example.ex: Among the protesters and war veterans proudly displaying their medals was Aubrey Rose...
example.tran: 在抗议者和骄傲地展示勋章的退伍老兵中，就有奥布里·罗斯。

example.ex: The cabinets display seventeenth-century blue-and-white porcelain.
example.tran: 展柜中陈列着17世纪的青花瓷。

entry.def: If you display something, you show it to people.

example.ex: She displayed her wound to the twelve gentlemen of the jury...
example.tran: 她给陪审团的 12 位男士看了她的伤口。

example.ex: The chart can then display the links connecting these groups.
example.tran: 这张图就会显示出这些群体之间的关联。

entry.tran: 显示，显露，表现(特性或情感)
entry.def: If you display a characteristic, quality, or emotion, you behave in a way which shows that you have it.

example.ex: It was unlike Gordon to display his feelings...
example.tran: 戈登不太可能表露他的情感。

example.ex: He has displayed remarkable courage in his efforts to reform the party.
example.tran: 在政党改革中，他表现出了非凡的勇气。

entry.def: When a computer displays information, it shows it on a screen.

example.ex: They started out by looking at the computer screens which display the images...
example.tran: 他们开始在显示那些图像的电脑屏幕上寻找。

example.ex: Using the option to display only text speeds things up a lot.
example.tran: 选用纯文本显示可以使速度大幅提升。

entry.def: A display is an arrangement of things that have been put in a particular place, so that people can see them easily.

example.ex: She was leaning against a display case of prints of Paris.
example.tran: 她正倚靠在一个展示巴黎照片的陈列柜上。

entry.def: A display is a public performance or other event which is intended to entertain people.

entry.tran: (计算机屏幕上的)显示，显像;显示器
entry.def: The display on a computer screen is the information that is shown there. The screen itself can also be referred to as the display .

example.ex: A hard copy of the screen display can also be obtained from a printer.
example.tran: 屏幕上显示的内容也可以通过打印机打印一份。

example.ex: ...obscure error messages appearing on the display.
example.tran: 显示器上出现的令人费解的错误信息

means.word_mean: 1. something intended to communicate a particular impression;

sentences.sentence: "the museum had many exhibits of oriental art"

means.word_mean: 3. an electronic device that represents information in visual form
5. behavior that makes your feelings public;
1. to show, make visible or apparent;

sentences.sentence: "The Metropolitan Museum is exhibiting Goya's works this month"
"Why don't you show your nice legs and wear shorter skirts?"
"National leaders will have to display the highest skills of statesmanship"
"The article revealed the policies of the government"

means.word_mean: 3. attract attention by displaying some body part or posing; of animals

auth_sentence.content: Here's a Norwegian forest cat proudly on display.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here's a Norwegian forest cat proudly on display.

auth_sentence.res_content: The breadth of ideas on display here is astonishing.

auth_sentence.content: It's all about the display, the presentation.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's all about the display, the presentation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's all about the display, the presentation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势

dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: Display and sales restrictions: California has a rule prohibiting alcohol displays near the cash registers in gas stations, and in most places you can't buy alcohol at drive-through facilities.
What is the purpose of California's rule about alcohol display in gas stations
So here's a suggestion offered by two researchers at the Rand Corporation: Why not take a lesson from alcohol control policies and apply them to where food is sold and how it's displayed?
He was inspired by the way the wares were displayed.
Google will be able to display up to 20% of orphan works for free, include them in its subscription deals to libraries and sell them to individual buyers under the consumer licence.
Google defends its scanning in-copyright books by saying that the online display of in-copyright books is not for commercial use.

sentences.en: A new kind of car was on display in the shop.
sentences.cn: 商店里展出一种新汽车。

sentences.en: The displays in Harrods are one of the sights in London.
sentences.cn: 哈罗德百货公司的陈列品是伦敦一景。

sentences.en: The young woman proudly displayed her furs.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻女人骄傲地炫耀她的皮衣。

sentences.en: He displayed an originality amounting almost to genius.
sentences.cn: 他显示出近乎天才的创造性。

jushi.english: The displays in Harrods are one of the sights in London.
jushi.chinese: 哈罗德百货公司的陈列品是伦敦一景。

jushi.english: A new kind of car was on display in the shop.
jushi.chinese: 商店里展出一种新汽车。

jushi.english: A pair of homemade cotton shoes is displayed in glass cases.
jushi.chinese: 一双自制布鞋摆放在玻璃橱里。
